name: I Believe
content: I believe a change is gonna come
Life has got a meaning
All we need is to believe
And I believe wisdom is inside us
Dreams and hopes will guide us
All we need is to believe
If there's hope in your heart
I believe a change is gonna come
Life has got a meaning
All we need is to believe
And I believe wisdom is inside us
Integrity will guide us
All we need is to believe
Every new horizon in the distance
Is a place we can reach
And I believe that Everything is one
And we are Everything
If we all stand together
I believe a change is gonna come
Life has got a meaning
All we need is to believe
And I believe wisdom is inside us
Dreams and hopes will guide us
All we need is to believe
I believe a change is gonna come
Life has got a meaning
All we need is to believe
And I believe wisdom is inside us
Dreams and hopes will guide us
All we need is to believe
I believe
